property.name: fieldLabel
property.label: Field Label
property.description: The label of the rich text editor.

property.name: fieldValue
property.label: Field Value
property.description: The HTML content in the rich text editor.

property.name: required
property.label: Required
property.description: Specifies whether users must enter content in the editor. If present, an asterisk is displayed before the label when label-visible is present.

property.name: fieldLength
property.label: Field Length
property.description: Up to 131,072 characters on separate lines.

property.name: visibleLines
property.label: # Visible Lines
property.description: # of Visible Lines is the number of lines you see when you are in edit mode.

property.name: recordId
property.label: Share with Entity Id
property.description: Entity ID to share the image with. Uploaded image files are accessible to all org users by default.
